explains: v. 使极度痛苦（anguish 的过去式）

sentences.en: She let out an anguished cry.
sentences.cn: 她发出了一声极为痛苦的叫喊。

sentences.en: Listen to the anguished squeal of a dolphin separated from its pod or witness the sight of elephants mourning their dead.
sentences.cn: 听一听从海豚群中分离出来的痛苦尖叫，或者亲眼目睹大象为它们的死亡哀悼。

sentences.en: How anguished, sad and helpless mother must have felt!
sentences.cn: 这在母亲心里是多么悲痛、悲哀和无可奈何的事啊！
